BR_text.BRdescription:
There is a minor bug in the  method in the  module on lines 366 and 367 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/blob/master/neuralmonkey/vocabulary.py#L367>https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/blob/master/neuralmonkey/vocabulary.py#L367</denchmark-link>
 
 The bug may cause non-deterministic behavior of the vocabulary initialization when there are special symbols among selected words_by_freq[:-size] because they are left out and therefore the size of words_to_delete may vary (max 4 tokens diff).
 Solution of this should render the PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/pull/539>#539</denchmark-link>
  irrelevant.
